description:
This versatile half rope is good for long routes, ice, or alpine. It provides a nice balance of strength and lightness, and the dry treatment handles wet and cold conditions, so your rope doesn't freeze into a stiff cable.

  • Golden Dry treatment protects both sheath and core from water absorption and adds resistance to humidity and grit
  • Unicore construction bonds the sheath and core so there should never be any sheath slippage
  • Low impact force produces a nice, soft catch
  • Use in sets of 2, except for simple glacier travel
  • Beal plants a tree for every rope sold
name: Beal Cobra 8.6mm Unicore Golden Dry Rope
